shortReason: Exhibited extreme disrespect to staff, used offensive slurs, threatened to leak IP addresses,  and attempted to bypass automoderation on multiple accounts.
longReason: The user displayed severe disrespect toward staff members, including directing homophobic slurs such as “faggot” at them.  They also threatened to leak staff members’ IP addresses and attempted to circumvent the server’s automoderation filters related to racial slurs by using multiple accounts created in close succession.
